Fire yai take the form of [fire giants](/Monsters.aspx?ID=223). Like fire giants, fire yai are shrewd and militaristic and have an incredible appetite for the thrill of war. While they engage in battle to conquer and control others, fire yai also love the thrill of war, fighting for the sheer joy of it. Presenting a fire yai with a true challenge in combat can potentially earn their mercy and an offer to join and serve at their side. Fire yai's third eyes shoot forth burning missiles of fire. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 32 **[Recall Knowledge - [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_, _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [katana](/Weapons.aspx?ID=55)_ --- **AC** 36 **Fort** +28 **Ref** +26 **Will** +24 +1 status on all saves vs. magic **HP** 250 , regeneration 15 (deactivated by acid or cold) **Immunities** fire **Weaknesses** cold 15 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 40 feet, fly 40 feet **Melee** katana +30 ([deadly 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [two-hand d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=198), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 2d6+16 slashing plus 2d6 fire **Melee** fist +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d6+16 bludgeoning plus 2d6 fire and 2d6 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Ranged** fire missile +26 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d10+16 fire plus 2d6 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Primal Innate Spells** DC 34 - **2nd** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will, self only) - **4th** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) (x3), [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129) - **6th** [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119) (x3) - **7th** [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Fiery Body](/Spells.aspx?ID=115), [Flame Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=120), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The fire yai takes on the appearance of a [fire giant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=223). This doesn't change their Speed or Strike attack and damage. **Impaling Push** The fire yai attempts a katana Strike. If it hits, the fire yai attempts an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check against the target creature's Fortitude DC.
**Critical Success** The fire yai Strides or Flies up to half its Speed in any direction. The struck creature takes 4d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and is pushed along with the yai an equal distance. The creature is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) until the yai's next turn or until the yai makes a katana Strike.
**Success** As critical success, but the creature takes 2d6 persistent bleed damage.
**Failure** The struck creature is pushed back 5 feet.
**Critical Failure** The struck creature is unaffected. **Smoke Form** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The fire yai transforms into a cloud of smoke and then Flies up to its fly speed. This movement does not trigger reactions, and the fire yai can move through spaces occupied by other creatures. The fire yai returns to its physical form after this move, and must end the movement in a space in which it can fit. All creatures in spaces through which the fire yai moves with Smoke Form must succeed at a DC 34 Fortitude save or become [sickened 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). The fire yai cannot use Smoke Form for 1d4 rounds.
